description.author: Alex Suraci <suraci.alex@gmail.com>
description.synopsis: Darcs repository UI and hosting/collaboration app.
description.description:
A web application and SSH server for browsing and hosting darcs
repositories and collaborating with others.

Installation: http://hub.darcs.net/simon/darcsden-1.0/README

1.0 release notes: http://hub.darcs.net/simon/darcsden-1.0/ANNOUNCE.md

1.0.1 changes:

* cabal file now includes the required highlightingkate/highlighter build flags

* cabal file points to a darcsden 1.0 source repo

package-flags.name: darcs28
package-flags.description: Build with released darcs 2.8.2+, not the latest darcs-screened.

package-flags.name: highlightingkate
package-flags.description: Enable source code highlighting, using highlighting-kate (faster).

package-flags.name: highlighter
package-flags.description: Enable source code highlighting, using highlighter.

package-flags.name: closing
package-flags.description: Enable closing of bugs in the post-hook

package-flags.name: ssh
package-flags.description: Enable ssh server for remote pushes
